actions.name: Jaws of Carnage

cost.trigger: The user Faints at least one creature with a [Jaw] attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user Faints at least one creature with a [Jaw] attack.
Effect: The user gains +1 ATK and CRIT stage for 5 activations, and heals 5 Ticks of HP.
